name: Sunset Island
description:
Originally created for the WolverineSoft Pumpkin Jam 2018, where the theme was "Fall."

You awaken on the mysterious sunset island with naught but an axe and a lantern. Explore the island, chop down trees, pick up rocks, and trade with the villagers in order to repair your equipment. Be prepared, however - on Sunset Island, nightfall holds something terrible.

Created by:

  • Kiva Nguyen
  • Joshua Rickard-Lukasavitz
  • Austin Riopelle
  • Jacob Smellie
  • Rob Swor
  • Seyhyun Yang
